newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - Santa Clara County, Calif..
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - Santa Clara County, Calif..

text.p: NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that the Santa Clara County of Board of Education, State of California (the County Board''), acting for the Santa Clara County Board of Education Finance Corporation (the Corporation''), intends to offer for public sale on

at the hour of 9:30 a.m., California time, at the office of Orrick, Herrington & Sutcliffe LLP, 400 Sansome Street, San Francisco, California 94111-3143, not to exceed $6,000,000 principal amount of Certificates of Participation designated Santa Clara County Board of Education 1997 Certificates of Participation (Child Care Facilities Project)

Certificates to be issued pursuant to a Trust Agreement dated as of June 1, 1997 by and among BNY Western Trust Company, as trustee, the County Board and the Corporation. The total principal amount of the Certificates and the principal component for each year shall be subject to increase or decrease in accordance with the Official Notice of Sale, so long as the total principal amount of the Certificates does not exceed $6,000,000. The County Board reserves the right to postpone to a later date or dates said public sale date by announcing such postponement through Thompson Municipal News and Bloomberg Business News no later than 24 hours prior to the hour fixed for receipt of bids. If the date of sale is postponed, bids will be received for the Certificates at the same place on such date and at such time as shall be designated by the County Board through Thompson Municipal News and Bloomberg Business News no

later than 24 hours prior to the new time bids are to be received. As an accommodation to bidders, telephonic or fax notice of the postponement of the sale date will be given to any bidder requesting such notice from the County Board's Financial Advisor, Kelling, Northcross & Nobriga, Inc., Attn. Dave Olson (510) 839-8200. Failure of any bidder to receive such news service, telephonic or fax notice shall not affect the legality of the sale. NOTICE IS HEREBY FURTHER GIVEN that the Certificates will be offered for public sale subject to the terms and conditions of the Official Notice of Sale of the
Certificates, dated May 21, 1997, and copies of the Official Notice of Sale and of a Preliminary Official Statement
relating to the Certificates will be furnished upon request to Kelling, Northcross & Nobriga, Inc., 1333 Broadway, Suite 1000, Oakland, California 94612, tel. no. (510) 839-8200.
Santa Clara County Board of Education
